bazaarInventory.name: AK-47
bazaarInventory.description: Reliable, 7.62x39mm automatic rifle, unrivalled in its power under environmental stress.

bazaarInventory.name: Toyota Hilux
bazaarInventory.description: A robust, no-nonsense all-terrain pickup truck, ready for HMG attachments.

bazaarInventory.name: T-34/76
bazaarInventory.description: An old, inexpensive Soviet tank mass-produced during the second world war.

bazaarInventory.name: M1 Abrams
bazaarInventory.description: The top of the line from Shifting Sands. Civil wars can be fought with only a handful of cutting-edge battle tanks.

bazaarInventory.name: R-44 Raven II
bazaarInventory.description: A standard civilian helicopter, capable of carrying a small fireteam and some equipment.

bazaarInventory.name: MH-6 Little Bird
bazaarInventory.description: A small, agile helicopter capable of housing machine guns and rockets. Small bird, big caw.

bazaarInventory.name: AH-64 Apache
bazaarInventory.description: The apex predator of the sky. Comes with thermal imaging, explosive machine guns and missiles. Fear the skies.
